summary: May 13 is the 133rd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Gene Sarazen  was an American professional golfer, one of the world's top players in the 1920s and 1930s. He is one of five golfers  to win all the current major championships in his career, the Career Grand Slam: U.S. Open in 1922, 1932, PGA Championship in 1922, 1923, 1933, The Open Championship in 1932, and Masters Tournament in 1935.
title: Gene Sarazen
